create.description.service.name.label: Name
create.description.text.csw: CS-W (Catalogue Service for the Web) can serve dataset and service metadata.
create.description.text.sos: SOS (Sensor Observation Service) can serve real-time sensor data.
create.description.text.wcs: WCS (Web Coverage Service) can serve coverage data as raw data, to get pixel value
create.description.text.wfs: A WFS (Web Feature Service) can serve spatially referenced data as textual or binary formats like GML, Shape, ...
create.description.text.wms: A WMS (Web Mapping Service) can serve geographic data as georeferenced images.
create.description.text.wmts: A WMTS (Web Mapping Tile Service) can serve map tiles of spatially referenced data using tile images with predefined content, extent, and resolution.
create.description.text.wps: WPS (Web Processing Service) can serve geoprocessing logic as Web Services
